original_text: So Jesus stopped travelling about in Judea where everyone could see him. Instead, he went away from there to a town called Ephraim that was near to the wilderness. He stayed there with his disciples.
korean_text: 그러므로 예수께서 다시 유대인 가운데 드러나게 다니지 아니하시고 거기를 떠나 빈 들 가까운 곳인 에브라임이라는 동네에 가서 제자들과 함께 거기 머무르시니라

sentences.original_text: So Jesus stopped travelling about in Judea
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 예수님은 유다 지방에서 다니는 것을 멈추셨습니다
모든 사람이 그를 볼 수 있는 곳에서

sentences.original_text: Instead, he went away from there
that was near to the wilderness
He stayed there with his disciples
